attributes.action: GENERAL ELECTION NOW - the vote must go to the people UK and not Tory members
attributes.additional_details: We are fed up of Tories putting their interests first before the tax paying public.  We are a democracy and this is pattern of Tory members choosing the next PM has brought this country to its knees.  This is not democracy this is a dictatorship.
attributes.background:
Enough is enough. To be the PM is for the interest of the people and not for Tory party members.

This party has been full of fraud, criminality and utter incompetence.  Their sheer arrogance that they are untouchable and can do as they please MUST END.
